Right-click the Blaze Burner with an Cooking Guide in hand when sneaking
To retrieve the cooking guide, right-click the Blaze Stove with wrench when sneaking
create_central_kitchen.ponder.stove_and_: Blaze Stove can provide mechanical arm support for the Pot, so let it control the cooking!
Cooking can still be done even without adding fuel to the Blaze Stove.
The hotter the fire, the faster the cooking.
